title: WHY IS MY WUKONG RADIANT SKIN GREY???
body: I bought my new wukong skin today and when i died i got all gray and it still is if i die to an enemy or dragon. dont understand why?{{champion:62}}

replies.body: same. when i die with the radiant skin wukong turns grey and then stays grey all game unless i dc and reconnect.
is it like a bug or something

> [{quoted}](name=Rosander19,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=dczQsueU,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-03-22T19:49:49.479+0000)
>
> is it like a bug or something

i think so
Just on the off-chance you are a child and this is not a shitpost... When Wukong dies, he turns to stone. That is why he turns gray.
This.

i dont understand bc i just got my wukong skin and if i die to an enemy champ i get grey even if i respawn i am still grey and my friend tested the bug and its only for me. that i turn grey when i respawn??

Ah, okay, so you're talking on respawn! Gotcha, lemme take a look.

**EDIT**: Okay, I'm not able to repro this one either. I've died to dragon and come back just fine. Would you be able to grab me a video/screenshot of what you're seeing?
https://youtu.be/ClWXwUKOfso ok if you watch till the end you will see when he die he will become stone and when i respawn my skin stay that way until the game end or ill dc and reconnect

Right right, I get what you mean. Would you happen to have a video, though, so I can see if there were some other factors involved that may have caused it, i.e. something happened before you died? 

**EDIT**: Okay! Figured it out! Looks like it's just when he dies, the gray overlay is reapplying once he's alive again. I may have not have pulled the latest file revisions when I checked before, but I think we've got solid repro now. Going to dig into this a bit more!
Since I dont know if you already got a gamplay of this happening. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vjinz11Vrbc
so are you able to fix that next patch or never going to fix it. just curious

sure tomorrow! its very late and im in bed right now so i cant start the computer. its like when i die i turn to stone and when i respawn it doesnt change so im just grey i cant chanhe back to normal (what it should look like) if i dont leave the game bc then it will reset to normal skin.
sure tomorrow! its very late and im in bed right now so i cant start the computer.
what do mean by "this"

Yea just got this today... It was weird, only 2 of us in a pre-made of 4 saw it.   

http://prntscr.com/ivzuja

I purchased Radiant Wukong this patch and I don't have a video to display the problem but, I also am having this bug. If you have the skin on and you die either to an enemy champion or tower, when you respawn your texture will be correct. However, upon leaving the fountain, your texture will change to the dead Wukong texture. If you want to test this, you can go into the practice tool and teleport into the enemy fountain. When you repawn run out of fountain and your texture will change either when the ghost effect wears off or after you pass the nexus towers.
YEEES THAT I WHAT I MEAN!!
This is legit.  Ive played raidant wukong for almost a year now and this is unique to this patch.
....you mean he turns to stone......like the lore of the monkey king.....
no ive watched many vids of that skin and when they die it doesnt change to stone

> [{quoted}](name=Rosander19,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=dczQsueU,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-03-22T19:48:24.088+0000)
>
> no ive watched many vids of that skin and when they die it doesnt change to stone

no....it changes to stone.....do your research lmao
https://youtu.be/IJPjU2po_Gg?t=8m56s does it???

> [{quoted}](name=Rosander19,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=dczQsueU,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-22T19:53:04.574+0000)
>
> https://youtu.be/IJPjU2po_Gg?t=8m56s does it???

yeah it does. idk what your trying to link there, but none of his deaths show wukong as he scrolls around on death. Wukong turns to stone on death....that is from the journey to the west where wukong is born from stone. again do some research or watch a skin spotlight or something ...
sorry i meant that if i die to a champion or a dragon after i respawn i get grey until the match is over

> [{quoted}](name=Rosander19,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=dczQsueU,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-22T19:53:04.574+0000)
>
> https://youtu.be/IJPjU2po_Gg?t=8m56s does it???

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ClWXwUKOfso at 2:52 bruh
This is happening to me too. Started yesterday same skin. 1 death, grey all game long.

I wrote on my EUW forum but no one answers me, I enclose what was found and written on the other forum:

"" "
I found a constant, if someone has the wukong radiant skin and wants to try:

1 the wukong radiant skin is regular in color until the first death
2 leaving the base after the first death, the color of the champ becomes the same as that of the wukong "deceased" then white / silver
3 if I leave the game and reconnect, the champ returns to have a regular color
4 if you die the bug will reoccur and the color will turn white / silver again
5 looking at a game of another player with the wukong radiant skin, and even in observer mode the bug works the same way
"" "

I sent the video attached to the bug report
bye

Happen to me just now ingame too. died and then it never went back to normal!
https://i.imgur.com/iOCtZ51.png

Don't use this skin. If you use Decoy, the decoy appears in the normal skin and gives a giant red flag to enemies. So you have to gank from offscreen or not use it with the intention of them attacking it
i found a video how its looks for me https://youtu.be/EAflNIomf1g
why does this have downvotes its a legit bug, theres no reason to downvote at all
i was just on the pbe and tested if it would be that glitch there and it is still that way after i die to dragon go out of spawn and you will become grey as you were when you dead{{item:3070}}
yea im getting this too, im perma grey wukong after dying. seems to be a visual bug. pls fix
